REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2273 reute d f BC-BAYOU-INTERNATIONAL-G 04-03 0041

TEXT.TITLE: BAYOU INTERNATIONAL GETS STAKE IN AMALGAMATED
TEXT.BODY: Bayou International Ltd said it acquired 19.9 pct of <Amalgamated Equities Ltd> of Australia for 710,000 dlrs. Bayou is 55.2 pct owned by <Australia Wide Industries Ltd>. Reuter
